name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior DevOps Engineer with 13+ years of expertise in CI/CD, Git, and Azure DevOps, ensuring streamlined integration and delivery of applications. Proficient in managing cloud infrastructure on **AWS** and **Azure**, utilizing services like **RDS**, **Lambda**, and **CloudTrail** to optimize performance and reliability. Skilled in infrastructure as code with **Terraform** and configuration management using **SaltStack**, enhancing automation and system consistency.
Experienced in scripting with **Python**, **Perl**, **Groovy**, and **Ruby**, implementing efficient automation strategies and fostering collaboration among teams. Deep understanding of incident management and performance optimization strategies, supported by a strong background in Linux and networking.
Additionally, well-versed in compliance-driven practices, aligning with industry standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. Renowned for strong problem-solving abilities and dedication to mentorship, contributing to team growth and project success.
